original_text: When Delilah saw that he had told her everything, she sent word to the rulers of the Philistines, “Come back once more; he has told me everything.” So the rulers of the Philistines returned with the silver in their hands.
korean_text: 들릴라가 삼손이 진심을 다 알려 주므로 사람을 보내어 블레셋 사람들의 방백들을 불러 이르되 삼손이 내게 진심을 알려 주었으니 이제 한 번만 올라오라 하니 블레셋 방백들이 손에 은을 가지고 그 여인에게로 올라오니라

sentences.original_text: When Delilah saw that he had told her everything
sentences.korean_translation: 살라가 그가 모든 것을 그녀에게 말했다는 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: she sent word to the rulers of the Philistines
So the rulers of the Philistines returned
with the silver in their hands
